XRD / XRR Fringe Analysis

Source: R/xrd.FringeAnalysis.R
xrd.FringeAnalysis.Rd

Searches for fringes in the XRD or XRR spectrum and returns a list with the thickness, a peak table, and two graphs displaying the results.

xrd.FringeAnalysis(df)

Arguments

df

data frame with theta (2q) and I (intensity)

Value

list with thickness, table of peaks, and two ggplot graphs

Author

Thomas Gredig

Examples

  filename <- xrd.getSampleFiles('rasx')
  data <- xrd.import(filename)
  analysis <- xrd.FringeAnalysis(data)
  print(analysis$t.nm)
#>   [1] 110.41967  63.09932 176.68396 126.20552  84.13967  98.16646  73.62775
